name: Untitled Crab Game (shangqingnya)
description:
The furious spirit of a spiteful old man has returned for revenge! This crab-sized incarnation of hate is on the prowl to mess with humans on a beach and create mayhem. Pick things up to throw, pinch humans, and cause chaos in Untitled Crab Game and live out your evil crab dream!

GOAL: Jump on things and stay in the air while throwing rocks in hoops to maintain your combo multiplier and reach HUGE numbers for your score

CONTROLS:

Left Click to pick up and Throw rocks

Right Click to Strafe

E to Grappling Hook

WASD to Move

Credits:

Jose Estrada (Programming)

Trevor Tengowski (Programming)

Emma Mandera (3D Modelling)

Eleanore Falck (3D Model and Level Design)

Sade Parker(3D Modelling)
